divs: Sighting DetailsAs my husband was driving down the street, I(passenger seat) took a random picture with my new camera. I'm learning the manual settings so I am always practicing. I rolled down the window and snapped at nothing in particular. I checked my lighting and focusing in the camera and saw this white object. I quickly scanned the sky where I had just shot and there was nothing there except one wispy faint cloud. I took another picture about a minute later in case something was stuck on the lens. It was clear. My son thinks it is a refractory something having to do with the camera. My sister wanted me to send this in, even though I am quite skeptical of all UFO stories.
trends: There have been 73 other sightings in Mesa
There was one other sighting in Mesa on or around April 10th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: showed up on a picture I took
